column4: are there best practices for linux? im trying to install http://linuxtv.org/hg/~pinchartl/uvcvideo/ and im not sure where to
the best practice - to install everything by default. it's pretty good and you definitely won't break anything
sorry i dont really follow. im about to install something off a website that couldnt possibly have come with the installer of ubutu
Go here, download ISO and write it to CD: http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/download
